# CamboAdmin - Complete AI Documentation

> This file contains the complete documentation for CamboAdmin, optimized for AI assistants.
> Last updated: 2026-02-07

## Package Information

- **Name**: cambosoftware/cambo-admin
- **Version**: 1.0.0
- **License**: MIT
- **Documentation**: https://cambo-admin.cambosoftware.com
- **GitHub**: https://github.com/cambosoftware/cambo-admin
- **Packagist**: https://packagist.org/packages/cambosoftware/cambo-admin

## Requirements

- PHP 8.2 or higher
- Laravel 11.x or 12.x
- Node.js 18.x or higher
- Composer 2.x
- npm or pnpm

## Installation

### New Project

```bash
# Create Laravel project
composer create-project laravel/laravel my-admin-app
cd my-admin-app

# Configure database in .env
# DB_CONNECTION=mysql
# DB_DATABASE=my_admin
# DB_USERNAME=root
# DB_PASSWORD=

# Install CamboAdmin
composer require cambosoftware/cambo-admin

# Full installation (recommended)
php artisan cambo:install --full

# Install frontend
npm install
npm run build

# Run migrations
php artisan migrate

# Start server
php artisan serve
```

### Existing Project

```bash
composer require cambosoftware/cambo-admin
php artisan cambo:install
npm install
npm run build
```

### Installation Options

```bash
# Full installation with all modules
php artisan cambo:install --full

# Interactive installation (choose modules)
php artisan cambo:install

# UI components only (no backend)
php artisan cambo:install --only=ui

# Specific modules
php artisan cambo:install --modules=auth,users,roles
```

## Configuration

File: `config/cambo-admin.php`

```php
<?php

return [
    // Enable/disable modules
    'modules' => [
        'auth' => true,           // Login, register, 2FA, password reset
        'users' => true,          // User management CRUD
        'roles' => true,          // Role management
        'permissions' => true,    // Permission management
        'notifications' => true,  // Notification center
        'activity-log' => true,   // Activity tracking
        'dashboard' => true,      // Dashboard with widgets
        'media' => true,          // File manager
        'settings' => true,       // Dynamic settings
        'import-export' => true,  // Data import/export
        'i18n' => true,           // Multi-language
        'themes' => true,         // Theme customization
    ],

    // Route configuration
    'routes' => [
        'enabled' => true,
        'prefix' => 'admin',
        'middleware' => ['web', 'auth', 'verified'],
        'as' => 'cambo.',
    ],

    // Appearance
    'appearance' => [
        'name' => env('APP_NAME', 'CamboAdmin'),
        'logo' => null,
        'favicon' => null,
        'primary_color' => '#6366f1',
        'dark_mode' => 'auto', // 'light', 'dark', 'auto'
    ],

    // Features
    'features' => [
        'registration' => true,
        'password_reset' => true,
        'two_factor' => true,
        'email_verification' => true,
        'remember_me' => true,
        'social_login' => false,
    ],

    // DataTable defaults
    'datatable' => [
        'per_page_options' => [10, 25, 50, 100],
        'default_per_page' => 25,
        'debounce_search' => 300,
    ],

    // Export formats
    'exports' => [
        'csv' => true,
        'excel' => true,
        'pdf' => false, // Requires barryvdh/laravel-dompdf
    ],

    // Media/File manager
    'media' => [
        'disk' => 'public',
        'max_upload_size' => 10240, // KB
        'allowed_types' => [
            'image' => ['jpg', 'jpeg', 'png', 'gif', 'svg', 'webp'],
            'document' => ['pdf', 'doc', 'docx', 'xls', 'xlsx', 'txt', 'csv'],
            'video' => ['mp4', 'avi', 'mov', 'wmv'],
            'audio' => ['mp3', 'wav', 'ogg'],
        ],
    ],

    // Locales
    'locales' => [
        'en' => ['name' => 'English', 'native' => 'English', 'rtl' => false],
        'fr' => ['name' => 'French', 'native' => 'Français', 'rtl' => false],
        'es' => ['name' => 'Spanish', 'native' => 'Español', 'rtl' => false],
        'ar' => ['name' => 'Arabic', 'native' => 'العربية', 'rtl' => true],
    ],
];
```

## CLI Commands

### CRUD Generator

```bash
php artisan cambo:crud ModelName --fields="field1:type,field2:type"
```

**Field Types**: string, text, integer, decimal, boolean, date, datetime, timestamp, json

**Examples**:

```bash
# Simple product
php artisan cambo:crud Product --fields="name:string,price:decimal,active:boolean"

# Blog post with relations
php artisan cambo:crud Post --fields="title:string,content:text,published_at:datetime,category_id:integer"

# With soft deletes
php artisan cambo:crud Article --fields="title:string,body:text" --soft-deletes
```

**Generated Files**:
- `database/migrations/xxxx_create_products_table.php`
- `app/Models/Product.php`
- `app/Http/Controllers/ProductController.php`
- `resources/js/Pages/Products/Index.vue`
- `resources/js/Pages/Products/Create.vue`
- `resources/js/Pages/Products/Edit.vue`
- `resources/js/Pages/Products/Show.vue`

### Page Generator

```bash
php artisan cambo:page PageName [options]
```

**Options**:
- `--title="Page Title"` - Set page title
- `--with-card` - Include Card component
- `--with-table` - Include DataTable component
- `--with-form` - Include Form components

**Examples**:

```bash
php artisan cambo:page Dashboard
php artisan cambo:page Reports/Monthly --title="Monthly Report" --with-card --with-table
php artisan cambo:page Settings/Profile --title="Profile Settings" --with-form
```

### Component Generator

```bash
php artisan cambo:component ComponentName [options]
```

**Options**:
- `--category=Category` - Component category folder
- `--with-props` - Add props boilerplate
- `--with-emits` - Add emits boilerplate
- `--with-slots` - Add slots boilerplate

**Examples**:

```bash
php artisan cambo:component StatsCard --category=Widgets --with-props
php artisan cambo:component Charts/RevenueChart --with-props --with-emits
```

### Add Module

```bash
php artisan cambo:add module-name
```

**Available Modules**: notifications, activity-log, media, import-export, i18n, themes

## Components Reference

### Layout Components

#### AdminLayout
Main layout wrapper with sidebar and navbar.

```vue
<script setup>
import AdminLayout from '@/Components/Layout/AdminLayout.vue'
</script>

<template>
  <AdminLayout title="Dashboard" :breadcrumbs="[{ label: 'Home', url: '/' }]">
    <!-- Page content -->
  </AdminLayout>
</template>
```

**Props**:
| Prop | Type | Default | Description |
|------|------|---------|-------------|
| title | String | '' | Page title |
| breadcrumbs | Array | [] | Breadcrumb items |
| fullWidth | Boolean | false | Remove max-width constraint |

#### Sidebar
Navigation sidebar component.

```vue
<Sidebar :items="menuItems" :collapsed="isCollapsed" />
```

**Props**:
| Prop | Type | Default | Description |
|------|------|---------|-------------|
| items | Array | [] | Menu items |
| collapsed | Boolean | false | Collapsed state |
| theme | String | 'dark' | 'dark' or 'light' |

#### Navbar
Top navigation bar.

```vue
<Navbar :user="currentUser" :notifications="notifications" />
```

#### Breadcrumb
Breadcrumb navigation.

```vue
<Breadcrumb :items="[
  { label: 'Home', url: '/' },
  { label: 'Users', url: '/users' },
  { label: 'Edit' }
]" />
```

#### PageHeader
Page title with actions.

```vue
<PageHeader title="Users" subtitle="Manage system users">
  <template #actions>
    <Button>Add User</Button>
  </template>
</PageHeader>
```

### UI Components

#### Button
```vue
<Button variant="primary" size="md" :loading="isLoading" @click="handleClick">
  Click Me
</Button>
```

**Props**:
| Prop | Type | Default | Description |
|------|------|---------|-------------|
| variant | String | 'primary' | primary, secondary, success, danger, warning, info, light, dark |
| size | String | 'md' | sm, md, lg |
| type | String | 'button' | button, submit, reset |
| loading | Boolean | false | Show loading spinner |
| disabled | Boolean | false | Disable button |
| outline | Boolean | false | Outline style |
| pill | Boolean | false | Rounded pill style |
| block | Boolean | false | Full width |
| href | String | null | Link URL (renders as <a>) |
| iconLeft | String | null | Icon name on left |
| iconRight | String | null | Icon name on right |

#### ButtonGroup
```vue
<ButtonGroup>
  <Button>One</Button>
  <Button>Two</Button>
  <Button>Three</Button>
</ButtonGroup>
```

**Props**:
| Prop | Type | Default | Description |
|------|------|---------|-------------|
| vertical | Boolean | false | Vertical layout |

#### IconButton
```vue
<IconButton icon="trash" variant="danger" @click="deleteItem" />
```

**Props**:
| Prop | Type | Default | Description |
|------|------|---------|-------------|
| icon | String | required | Heroicon name |
| variant | String | 'secondary' | Button variant |
| size | String | 'md' | sm, md, lg |
| rounded | Boolean | false | Fully rounded |

#### Badge
```vue
<Badge variant="success">Active</Badge>
<Badge variant="danger" dot>Offline</Badge>
<Badge removable @remove="handleRemove">Tag</Badge>
```

**Props**:
| Prop | Type | Default | Description |
|------|------|---------|-------------|
| variant | String | 'primary' | primary, secondary, success, danger, warning, info |
| size | String | 'md' | sm, md, lg |
| dot | Boolean | false | Show as dot indicator |
| pill | Boolean | false | Rounded pill |
| outline | Boolean | false | Outline style |
| removable | Boolean | false | Show remove button |

#### Avatar
```vue
<Avatar src="/path/to/image.jpg" alt="John Doe" size="lg" />
<Avatar name="John Doe" /> <!-- Shows initials JD -->
<Avatar name="John Doe" status="online" />
```

**Props**:
| Prop | Type | Default | Description |
|------|------|---------|-------------|
| src | String | null | Image URL |
| alt | String | '' | Alt text |
| name | String | null | Name for initials fallback |
| size | String | 'md' | xs, sm, md, lg, xl, 2xl |
| status | String | null | online, offline, busy, away |
| rounded | Boolean | true | Rounded shape |

#### AvatarGroup
```vue
<AvatarGroup :max="3">
  <Avatar name="John Doe" />
  <Avatar name="Jane Smith" />
  <Avatar name="Bob Wilson" />
  <Avatar name="Alice Brown" />
</AvatarGroup>
```

**Props**:
| Prop | Type | Default | Description |
|------|------|---------|-------------|
| max | Number | 5 | Maximum visible avatars |
| size | String | 'md' | Avatar size |

#### Spinner
```vue
<Spinner size="lg" color="primary" />
```

**Props**:
| Prop | Type | Default | Description |
|------|------|---------|-------------|
| size | String | 'md' | xs, sm, md, lg, xl |
| color | String | 'primary' | primary, secondary, white, current |

#### Skeleton
```vue
<Skeleton type="text" :lines="3" />
<Skeleton type="circular" width="48px" height="48px" />
<Skeleton type="rectangular" height="200px" />
```

**Props**:
| Prop | Type | Default | Description |
|------|------|---------|-------------|
| type | String | 'text' | text, circular, rectangular, rounded |
| width | String | '100%' | Width |
| height | String | '1rem' | Height |
| lines | Number | 1 | Number of text lines |

#### Tooltip
```vue
<Tooltip content="This is a tooltip" position="top">
  <Button>Hover me</Button>
</Tooltip>
```

**Props**:
| Prop | Type | Default | Description |
|------|------|---------|-------------|
| content | String | required | Tooltip text |
| position | String | 'top' | top, bottom, left, right |
| delay | Number | 200 | Show delay in ms |
| arrow | Boolean | true | Show arrow |

#### Divider
```vue
<Divider />
<Divider label="OR" />
<Divider vertical />
<Divider dashed />
```

**Props**:
| Prop | Type | Default | Description |
|------|------|---------|-------------|
| label | String | null | Center label |
| vertical | Boolean | false | Vertical orientation |
| dashed | Boolean | false | Dashed style |

### Form Components

#### Form
```vue
<script setup>
import { useForm } from '@inertiajs/vue3'

const form = useForm({
  name: '',
  email: '',
})

const submit = () => form.post('/users')
</script>

<template>
  <Form @submit="submit">
    <!-- Form fields -->
    <Button type="submit" :loading="form.processing">Submit</Button>
  </Form>
</template>
```

#### FormGroup
```vue
<FormGroup
  label="Email"
  :error="form.errors.email"
  hint="We'll never share your email"
  required
>
  <Input v-model="form.email" type="email" />
</FormGroup>
```

**Props**:
| Prop | Type | Default | Description |
|------|------|---------|-------------|
| label | String | null | Field label |
| error | String | null | Error message |
| hint | String | null | Help text |
| required | Boolean | false | Show required indicator |
| inline | Boolean | false | Inline layout |

#### Input
```vue
<Input
  v-model="value"
  type="text"
  placeholder="Enter text..."
  :disabled="false"
  :readonly="false"
/>

<Input v-model="search" icon-left="search" clearable />
<Input v-model="url" prefix="https://" suffix=".com" />
```

**Props**:
| Prop | Type | Default | Description |
|------|------|---------|-------------|
| modelValue | String/Number | '' | v-model value |
| type | String | 'text' | text, email, password, number, tel, url |
| placeholder | String | null | Placeholder text |
| disabled | Boolean | false | Disabled state |
| readonly | Boolean | false | Readonly state |
| size | String | 'md' | sm, md, lg |
| iconLeft | String | null | Left icon |
| iconRight | String | null | Right icon |
| prefix | String | null | Prefix text |
| suffix | String | null | Suffix text |
| clearable | Boolean | false | Show clear button |

#### Textarea
```vue
<Textarea
  v-model="content"
  placeholder="Enter description..."
  :rows="5"
  :maxlength="500"
  show-count
  resize="vertical"
/>
```

**Props**:
| Prop | Type | Default | Description |
|------|------|---------|-------------|
| modelValue | String | '' | v-model value |
| rows | Number | 3 | Number of rows |
| maxlength | Number | null | Maximum characters |
| showCount | Boolean | false | Show character count |
| resize | String | 'vertical' | none, vertical, horizontal, both |

#### Select
```vue
<Select
  v-model="selected"
  :options="[
    { value: 'a', label: 'Option A' },
    { value: 'b', label: 'Option B' },
  ]"
  placeholder="Choose..."
/>
```

**Props**:
| Prop | Type | Default | Description |
|------|------|---------|-------------|
| modelValue | Any | null | v-model value |
| options | Array | [] | Options array |
| placeholder | String | 'Select...' | Placeholder |
| disabled | Boolean | false | Disabled state |
| multiple | Boolean | false | Multiple selection |

#### SelectSearch
Searchable dropdown with filtering.

```vue
<SelectSearch
  v-model="selected"
  :options="users"
  label-key="name"
  value-key="id"
  searchable
  clearable
/>
```

**Props**:
| Prop | Type | Default | Description |
|------|------|---------|-------------|
| modelValue | Any | null | v-model value |
| options | Array | [] | Options array |
| labelKey | String | 'label' | Key for option label |
| valueKey | String | 'value' | Key for option value |
| searchable | Boolean | true | Enable search |
| clearable | Boolean | false | Show clear button |
| placeholder | String | 'Select...' | Placeholder |

#### SelectMultiple
Multiple selection with tags.

```vue
<SelectMultiple
  v-model="selectedTags"
  :options="tags"
  :max="5"
/>
```

**Props**:
| Prop | Type | Default | Description |
|------|------|---------|-------------|
| modelValue | Array | [] | v-model value |
| options | Array | [] | Options array |
| max | Number | null | Maximum selections |
| searchable | Boolean | true | Enable search |

#### Checkbox
```vue
<Checkbox v-model="accepted" label="I accept the terms" />
<Checkbox v-model="indeterminate" :indeterminate="true" />
```

**Props**:
| Prop | Type | Default | Description |
|------|------|---------|-------------|
| modelValue | Boolean | false | v-model value |
| label | String | null | Checkbox label |
| disabled | Boolean | false | Disabled state |
| indeterminate | Boolean | false | Indeterminate state |

#### CheckboxGroup
```vue
<CheckboxGroup
  v-model="selectedItems"
  :options="[
    { value: 'a', label: 'Option A' },
    { value: 'b', label: 'Option B' },
  ]"
/>
```

#### Radio
```vue
<Radio v-model="choice" value="option1" label="Option 1" />
<Radio v-model="choice" value="option2" label="Option 2" />
```

#### RadioGroup
```vue
<RadioGroup
  v-model="selected"
  :options="[
    { value: 'small', label: 'Small' },
    { value: 'medium', label: 'Medium' },
    { value: 'large', label: 'Large' },
  ]"
/>
```

#### RadioCards
Card-style radio buttons.

```vue
<RadioCards
  v-model="plan"
  :options="[
    { value: 'free', label: 'Free', description: 'Basic features' },
    { value: 'pro', label: 'Pro', description: 'All features', icon: 'star' },
  ]"
  :cols="3"
/>
```

#### Switch
```vue
<Switch v-model="enabled" label="Enable notifications" />
<Switch v-model="darkMode" on-label="Dark" off-label="Light" />
```

**Props**:
| Prop | Type | Default | Description |
|------|------|---------|-------------|
| modelValue | Boolean | false | v-model value |
| label | String | null | Label text |
| onLabel | String | null | Label when on |
| offLabel | String | null | Label when off |
| disabled | Boolean | false | Disabled state |
| color | String | 'primary' | Color variant |

#### Toggle
Segmented button group.

```vue
<Toggle
  v-model="view"
  :options="[
    { value: 'list', label: 'List', icon: 'list-bullet' },
    { value: 'grid', label: 'Grid', icon: 'squares-2x2' },
  ]"
/>
```

#### DatePicker
```vue
<DatePicker v-model="date" format="YYYY-MM-DD" />
```

**Props**:
| Prop | Type | Default | Description |
|------|------|---------|-------------|
| modelValue | String/Date | null | v-model value |
| format | String | 'YYYY-MM-DD' | Date format |
| minDate | Date | null | Minimum date |
| maxDate | Date | null | Maximum date |
| placeholder | String | 'Select date' | Placeholder |

#### DateRangePicker
```vue
<DateRangePicker v-model="dateRange" />
<!-- dateRange = { start: '2024-01-01', end: '2024-01-31' } -->
```

#### TimePicker
```vue
<TimePicker v-model="time" format="HH:mm" />
```

#### DateTimePicker
```vue
<DateTimePicker v-model="datetime" />
```

#### ColorPicker
```vue
<ColorPicker v-model="color" :presets="['#ff0000', '#00ff00', '#0000ff']" />
```

#### FilePicker
```vue
<FilePicker
  v-model="file"
  accept=".pdf,.doc,.docx"
  :max-size="5 * 1024 * 1024"
/>
```

#### ImagePicker
```vue
<ImagePicker
  v-model="image"
  :preview="true"
  :crop="true"
  :aspect-ratio="16/9"
/>
```

#### FileDropzone
```vue
<FileDropzone
  v-model="files"
  multiple
  accept="image/*"
  :max-files="5"
  @upload="handleUpload"
/>
```

**Props**:
| Prop | Type | Default | Description |
|------|------|---------|-------------|
| modelValue | Array | [] | v-model files |
| multiple | Boolean | false | Allow multiple files |
| accept | String | '*' | Accepted file types |
| maxFiles | Number | null | Maximum files |
| maxSize | Number | null | Max file size in bytes |

#### RichTextEditor
```vue
<RichTextEditor v-model="content" :toolbar="['bold', 'italic', 'link', 'image']" />
```

#### MarkdownEditor
```vue
<MarkdownEditor v-model="markdown" :preview="true" />
```

#### CodeEditor
```vue
<CodeEditor v-model="code" language="javascript" :line-numbers="true" />
```

#### TagInput
```vue
<TagInput v-model="tags" placeholder="Add tags..." :max="10" />
```

#### SliderInput
```vue
<SliderInput v-model="value" :min="0" :max="100" :step="5" />
```

#### RangeInput
```vue
<RangeInput v-model="range" :min="0" :max="1000" />
<!-- range = { min: 200, max: 800 } -->
```

#### RatingInput
```vue
<RatingInput v-model="rating" :max="5" />
```

#### PasswordInput
```vue
<PasswordInput v-model="password" :show-toggle="true" :strength-meter="true" />
```

#### SearchInput
```vue
<SearchInput v-model="query" @search="handleSearch" :debounce="300" />
```

#### PhoneInput
```vue
<PhoneInput v-model="phone" default-country="US" />
```

#### CurrencyInput
```vue
<CurrencyInput v-model="amount" currency="USD" locale="en-US" />
```

#### NumberInput
```vue
<NumberInput v-model="quantity" :min="0" :max="100" :step="1" />
```

### Data Display Components

#### DataTable
Full-featured data table with sorting, filtering, pagination, and export.

```vue
<script setup>
const columns = [
  { key: 'id', label: 'ID', sortable: true },
  { key: 'name', label: 'Name', sortable: true, searchable: true },
  { key: 'email', label: 'Email', sortable: true, searchable: true },
  { key: 'status', label: 'Status', type: 'badge' },
  { key: 'created_at', label: 'Created', type: 'date', format: 'MMM D, YYYY' },
  { key: 'actions', label: '', type: 'actions' },
]
</script>

<template>
  <DataTable
    :resource="users"
    :columns="columns"
    searchable
    exportable
  >
    <template #cell-status="{ value }">
      <Badge :variant="value === 'active' ? 'success' : 'danger'">
        {{ value }}
      </Badge>
    </template>

    <template #cell-actions="{ row }">
      <ButtonGroup>
        <IconButton icon="pencil" @click="edit(row)" />
        <IconButton icon="trash" variant="danger" @click="delete(row)" />
      </ButtonGroup>
    </template>
  </DataTable>
</template>
```

**Props**:
| Prop | Type | Default | Description |
|------|------|---------|-------------|
| resource | Object | required | Paginated data from Laravel |
| columns | Array | [] | Column definitions |
| searchable | Boolean | false | Enable search |
| exportable | Boolean | false | Enable export |
| selectable | Boolean | false | Enable row selection |
| actions | Boolean | true | Show action column |

**Column Types**: text, number, date, datetime, badge, boolean, image, link, actions

#### Table
Basic HTML table wrapper.

```vue
<Table>
  <TableHead>
    <TableRow>
      <TableCell header>Name</TableCell>
      <TableCell header>Email</TableCell>
    </TableRow>
  </TableHead>
  <TableBody>
    <TableRow v-for="user in users" :key="user.id">
      <TableCell>{{ user.name }}</TableCell>
      <TableCell>{{ user.email }}</TableCell>
    </TableRow>
  </TableBody>
</Table>
```

#### Pagination
```vue
<Pagination
  :current-page="1"
  :total-pages="10"
  :per-page="25"
  :total="250"
  @page-change="handlePageChange"
/>
```

#### List
```vue
<List>
  <ListItem v-for="item in items" :key="item.id">
    <template #avatar>
      <Avatar :name="item.name" />
    </template>
    <template #title>{{ item.name }}</template>
    <template #description>{{ item.email }}</template>
    <template #actions>
      <IconButton icon="chevron-right" />
    </template>
  </ListItem>
</List>
```

#### DescriptionList
```vue
<DescriptionList
  :items="[
    { label: 'Name', value: 'John Doe' },
    { label: 'Email', value: 'john@example.com' },
    { label: 'Status', value: 'Active', type: 'badge', variant: 'success' },
  ]"
  :columns="2"
/>
```

#### Tree
```vue
<Tree
  :items="treeData"
  :expandable="true"
  :selectable="true"
  v-model="selectedNodes"
/>
```

#### Timeline
```vue
<Timeline
  :items="[
    { title: 'Order placed', date: '2024-01-15', icon: 'shopping-cart' },
    { title: 'Shipped', date: '2024-01-16', icon: 'truck' },
    { title: 'Delivered', date: '2024-01-18', icon: 'check-circle', active: true },
  ]"
/>
```

#### Calendar
```vue
<Calendar
  v-model="selectedDate"
  :events="events"
  @event-click="handleEventClick"
/>
```

#### KanbanBoard
```vue
<KanbanBoard
  v-model="columns"
  @card-move="handleCardMove"
/>
```

### Chart Components

All charts use Chart.js under the hood.

#### LineChart
```vue
<LineChart
  :data="{
    labels: ['Jan', 'Feb', 'Mar', 'Apr'],
    datasets: [{
      label: 'Sales',
      data: [100, 200, 150, 300],
    }]
  }"
  :height="300"
/>
```

#### AreaChart
```vue
<AreaChart
  :data="chartData"
  :options="{ fill: true }"
/>
```

#### BarChart
```vue
<BarChart
  :data="chartData"
  :horizontal="false"
  :stacked="false"
/>
```

#### DonutChart
```vue
<DonutChart
  :data="{
    labels: ['Desktop', 'Mobile', 'Tablet'],
    datasets: [{
      data: [60, 30, 10],
    }]
  }"
/>
```

#### PieChart
```vue
<PieChart :data="chartData" />
```

#### StatCard
```vue
<StatCard
  title="Total Users"
  :value="1234"
  :change="12.5"
  change-type="increase"
  icon="users"
/>
```

**Props**:
| Prop | Type | Default | Description |
|------|------|---------|-------------|
| title | String | required | Stat title |
| value | Number/String | required | Stat value |
| change | Number | null | Percent change |
| changeType | String | null | increase, decrease |
| icon | String | null | Icon name |
| iconColor | String | 'primary' | Icon color |

#### StatGrid
```vue
<StatGrid :columns="4">
  <StatCard title="Users" :value="1234" icon="users" />
  <StatCard title="Revenue" value="$12,345" icon="currency-dollar" />
  <StatCard title="Orders" :value="567" icon="shopping-cart" />
  <StatCard title="Growth" value="23%" :change="5.2" icon="trending-up" />
</StatGrid>
```

#### MiniChart
Small inline chart for stat cards.

```vue
<MiniChart
  type="line"
  :data="[10, 25, 15, 30, 20, 35]"
  :width="100"
  :height="40"
/>
```

### Overlay Components

#### Modal
```vue
<script setup>
import { ref } from 'vue'
const isOpen = ref(false)
</script>

<template>
  <Button @click="isOpen = true">Open Modal</Button>

  <Modal v-model="isOpen" title="Modal Title" size="lg">
    <p>Modal content here</p>

    <template #footer>
      <Button variant="secondary" @click="isOpen = false">Cancel</Button>
      <Button variant="primary" @click="save">Save</Button>
    </template>
  </Modal>
</template>
```

**Props**:
| Prop | Type | Default | Description |
|------|------|---------|-------------|
| modelValue | Boolean | false | v-model open state |
| title | String | null | Modal title |
| size | String | 'md' | sm, md, lg, xl, full |
| closable | Boolean | true | Show close button |
| closeOnEscape | Boolean | true | Close on ESC key |
| closeOnClickOutside | Boolean | true | Close on backdrop click |

#### ConfirmModal
```vue
<ConfirmModal
  v-model="showConfirm"
  title="Delete Item"
  message="Are you sure you want to delete this item? This action cannot be undone."
  confirm-text="Delete"
  cancel-text="Cancel"
  variant="danger"
  @confirm="handleDelete"
  @cancel="showConfirm = false"
/>
```

#### Drawer
```vue
<Drawer v-model="isOpen" title="Settings" position="right" size="md">
  <p>Drawer content</p>
</Drawer>
```

**Props**:
| Prop | Type | Default | Description |
|------|------|---------|-------------|
| modelValue | Boolean | false | v-model open state |
| title | String | null | Drawer title |
| position | String | 'right' | left, right, top, bottom |
| size | String | 'md' | sm, md, lg, xl |

#### Dropdown
```vue
<Dropdown>
  <template #trigger>
    <Button>Options</Button>
  </template>

  <DropdownItem @click="edit">Edit</DropdownItem>
  <DropdownItem @click="duplicate">Duplicate</DropdownItem>
  <DropdownDivider />
  <DropdownItem @click="delete" variant="danger">Delete</DropdownItem>
</Dropdown>
```

#### Popover
```vue
<Popover position="bottom">
  <template #trigger>
    <Button>Info</Button>
  </template>

  <div class="p-4">
    <h4>Popover Title</h4>
    <p>Popover content goes here.</p>
  </div>
</Popover>
```

#### ContextMenu
```vue
<ContextMenu :items="[
  { label: 'Edit', icon: 'pencil', action: () => edit() },
  { label: 'Delete', icon: 'trash', action: () => delete(), variant: 'danger' },
]">
  <div>Right-click me</div>
</ContextMenu>
```

### Feedback Components

#### Alert
```vue
<Alert variant="success" title="Success!" dismissible>
  Your changes have been saved.
</Alert>

<Alert variant="danger" title="Error" icon="exclamation-circle">
  Something went wrong. Please try again.
</Alert>
```

**Props**:
| Prop | Type | Default | Description |
|------|------|---------|-------------|
| variant | String | 'info' | info, success, warning, danger |
| title | String | null | Alert title |
| icon | String | null | Icon name |
| dismissible | Boolean | false | Show dismiss button |

#### Toast
```vue
<script setup>
import { useToast } from '@/Composables/useToast'

const toast = useToast()

const showSuccess = () => {
  toast.success('Item saved successfully!')
}

const showError = () => {
  toast.error('Failed to save item', { duration: 5000 })
}
</script>
```

**Toast Methods**:
- `toast.success(message, options)`
- `toast.error(message, options)`
- `toast.warning(message, options)`
- `toast.info(message, options)`

#### ProgressBar
```vue
<ProgressBar :value="75" :max="100" variant="primary" :show-label="true" />
<ProgressBar :value="50" striped animated />
```

#### EmptyState
```vue
<EmptyState
  icon="inbox"
  title="No items found"
  description="Get started by creating a new item."
>
  <Button>Create Item</Button>
</EmptyState>
```

#### ErrorState
```vue
<ErrorState
  code="404"
  title="Page not found"
  description="The page you're looking for doesn't exist."
>
  <Button href="/">Go Home</Button>
</ErrorState>
```

### Container Components

#### Card
```vue
<Card>
  <template #header>
    <h3>Card Title</h3>
  </template>

  <p>Card content goes here.</p>

  <template #footer>
    <Button>Action</Button>
  </template>
</Card>
```

**Props**:
| Prop | Type | Default | Description |
|------|------|---------|-------------|
| padding | Boolean | true | Add padding |
| shadow | Boolean | true | Add shadow |
| border | Boolean | false | Add border |
| hoverable | Boolean | false | Hover effect |

#### CardGrid
```vue
<CardGrid :columns="3" gap="md">
  <Card v-for="item in items" :key="item.id">
    {{ item.name }}
  </Card>
</CardGrid>
```

#### Accordion
```vue
<Accordion :multiple="false">
  <AccordionItem title="Section 1" :default-open="true">
    Content for section 1
  </AccordionItem>
  <AccordionItem title="Section 2">
    Content for section 2
  </AccordionItem>
</Accordion>
```

#### Tabs
```vue
<Tabs v-model="activeTab">
  <Tab name="general" label="General">
    General settings content
  </Tab>
  <Tab name="security" label="Security">
    Security settings content
  </Tab>
  <Tab name="notifications" label="Notifications">
    Notification settings content
  </Tab>
</Tabs>
```

#### Collapse
```vue
<Collapse v-model="isOpen">
  <template #trigger>
    <Button>Toggle Content</Button>
  </template>

  <div>Collapsible content here</div>
</Collapse>
```

#### Panel
```vue
<Panel title="Panel Title" collapsible>
  Panel content
</Panel>
```

### Navigation Components

#### NavLink
```vue
<NavLink href="/dashboard" icon="home" :active="isActive">
  Dashboard
</NavLink>
```

#### NavGroup
```vue
<NavGroup label="Settings" icon="cog" :expanded="true">
  <NavLink href="/settings/general">General</NavLink>
  <NavLink href="/settings/security">Security</NavLink>
</NavGroup>
```

#### StepWizard
```vue
<StepWizard v-model="currentStep" :steps="[
  { title: 'Account', description: 'Create account' },
  { title: 'Profile', description: 'Add profile info' },
  { title: 'Confirm', description: 'Review and confirm' },
]">
  <template #step-1>
    <!-- Account form -->
  </template>
  <template #step-2>
    <!-- Profile form -->
  </template>
  <template #step-3>
    <!-- Confirmation -->
  </template>
</StepWizard>
```

#### BackButton
```vue
<BackButton fallback="/dashboard" />
```

#### CommandPalette
```vue
<CommandPalette
  v-model="isOpen"
  :commands="[
    { id: 'new-user', label: 'Create User', icon: 'user-plus', action: () => {} },
    { id: 'settings', label: 'Settings', icon: 'cog', action: () => {} },
  ]"
/>
```

### Utility Components

#### CopyButton
```vue
<CopyButton :text="textToCopy" />
```

#### ClickToCopy
```vue
<ClickToCopy text="text-to-copy">
  Click to copy this text
</ClickToCopy>
```

#### ExternalLink
```vue
<ExternalLink href="https://example.com">
  Visit Example
</ExternalLink>
```

#### Highlight
```vue
<Highlight :query="searchQuery">
  This text will have matching parts highlighted
</Highlight>
```

#### RelativeTime
```vue
<RelativeTime :date="createdAt" />
<!-- Output: "2 hours ago" -->
```

#### CountUp
```vue
<CountUp :value="1234" :duration="2000" />
```

#### Kbd
```vue
<Kbd>Ctrl</Kbd> + <Kbd>S</Kbd>
```

## Roles & Permissions

### Setup

Add HasRoles trait to User model:

```php
<?php

namespace App\Models;

use CamboSoftware\CamboAdmin\Models\Traits\HasRoles;
use Illuminate\Foundation\Auth\User as Authenticatable;

class User extends Authenticatable
{
    use HasRoles;
}
```

### Usage in PHP

```php
// Assign role
$user->assignRole('admin');
$user->assignRole(['editor', 'moderator']);

// Remove role
$user->removeRole('editor');

// Sync roles
$user->syncRoles(['admin', 'editor']);

// Check role
if ($user->hasRole('admin')) {
    // User is admin
}

if ($user->hasAnyRole(['admin', 'editor'])) {
    // User has at least one role
}

// Check permission
if ($user->hasPermission('users.create')) {
    // User can create users
}

if ($user->hasAnyPermission(['users.create', 'users.edit'])) {
    // User can create or edit users
}

// Get all permissions
$permissions = $user->getAllPermissions();
```

### Middleware

```php
// routes/web.php

// Single role
Route::middleware(['role:admin'])->group(function () {
    Route::get('/admin', [AdminController::class, 'index']);
});

// Multiple roles (OR)
Route::middleware(['role:admin,editor'])->group(function () {
    Route::resource('/posts', PostController::class);
});

// Single permission
Route::middleware(['permission:users.create'])->group(function () {
    Route::post('/users', [UserController::class, 'store']);
});

// Multiple permissions (OR)
Route::middleware(['permission:users.edit,users.delete'])->group(function () {
    Route::put('/users/{user}', [UserController::class, 'update']);
    Route::delete('/users/{user}', [UserController::class, 'destroy']);
});
```

### Usage in Vue

```vue
<script setup>
import { usePage } from '@inertiajs/vue3'
import { computed } from 'vue'

const page = usePage()

const can = (permission) => {
  return page.props.auth.permissions?.includes(permission)
}

const hasRole = (role) => {
  return page.props.auth.roles?.includes(role)
}

const isAdmin = computed(() => hasRole('admin'))
</script>

<template>
  <!-- Permission check -->
  <Button v-if="can('users.create')" @click="createUser">
    Create User
  </Button>

  <!-- Role check -->
  <AdminPanel v-if="isAdmin">
    Admin only content
  </AdminPanel>
</template>
```

## Services

### ThemeService

```php
use CamboSoftware\CamboAdmin\Services\ThemeService;

$themeService = app(ThemeService::class);

// Get current theme
$theme = $themeService->getCurrentTheme();

// Set theme
$themeService->setTheme('dark');

// Get primary color
$color = $themeService->getPrimaryColor();
```

### TranslationService

```php
use CamboSoftware\CamboAdmin\Services\TranslationService;

$translationService = app(TranslationService::class);

// Get translations for locale
$translations = $translationService->getTranslations('en');

// Set translation
$translationService->setTranslation('en', 'welcome', 'Welcome!');

// Get supported locales
$locales = $translationService->getSupportedLocales();
```

### ImportExportService

```php
use CamboSoftware\CamboAdmin\Services\ImportExportService;

$service = app(ImportExportService::class);

// Export to CSV
$path = $service->exportToCsv(User::all(), ['name', 'email'], 'users.csv');

// Export to Excel
$path = $service->exportToExcel(User::all(), ['name', 'email'], 'users.xlsx');

// Import from CSV
$result = $service->importFromCsv($filePath, [
    'name' => 'name',
    'email' => 'email',
], function ($row) {
    return User::create($row);
});
```

## QueryBuilder

Server-side data handling for DataTable.

```php
use CamboSoftware\CamboAdmin\QueryBuilder\QueryBuilder;

public function index()
{
    return inertia('Users/Index', [
        'users' => QueryBuilder::for(User::class)
            // Define columns
            ->columns(['id', 'name', 'email', 'role', 'created_at'])

            // Enable search on columns
            ->searchable(['name', 'email'])

            // Enable sorting on columns
            ->sortable(['name', 'email', 'created_at'])

            // Add filters
            ->filterable(['role', 'status'])

            // Enable exports
            ->exportable(['csv', 'excel', 'pdf'])

            // With relationships
            ->with(['roles', 'permissions'])

            // Apply scopes
            ->scope('active')

            // Paginate
            ->paginate(25)
    ]);
}
```

## Common Patterns

### CRUD Controller

```php
<?php

namespace App\Http\Controllers;

use App\Models\Product;
use Illuminate\Http\Request;
use Inertia\Inertia;

class ProductController extends Controller
{
    public function index()
    {
        return Inertia::render('Products/Index', [
            'products' => Product::latest()->paginate(25),
        ]);
    }

    public function create()
    {
        return Inertia::render('Products/Create');
    }

    public function store(Request $request)
    {
        $validated = $request->validate([
            'name' => 'required|string|max:255',
            'price' => 'required|numeric|min:0',
            'active' => 'boolean',
        ]);

        Product::create($validated);

        return redirect()->route('products.index')
            ->with('success', 'Product created successfully.');
    }

    public function show(Product $product)
    {
        return Inertia::render('Products/Show', [
            'product' => $product,
        ]);
    }

    public function edit(Product $product)
    {
        return Inertia::render('Products/Edit', [
            'product' => $product,
        ]);
    }

    public function update(Request $request, Product $product)
    {
        $validated = $request->validate([
            'name' => 'required|string|max:255',
            'price' => 'required|numeric|min:0',
            'active' => 'boolean',
        ]);

        $product->update($validated);

        return redirect()->route('products.index')
            ->with('success', 'Product updated successfully.');
    }

    public function destroy(Product $product)
    {
        $product->delete();

        return redirect()->route('products.index')
            ->with('success', 'Product deleted successfully.');
    }
}
```

### Index Page with DataTable

```vue
<script setup>
import { ref } from 'vue'
import { router } from '@inertiajs/vue3'
import AdminLayout from '@/Components/Layout/AdminLayout.vue'
import DataTable from '@/Components/Data/DataTable.vue'
import Button from '@/Components/UI/Button.vue'
import ConfirmModal from '@/Components/Overlays/ConfirmModal.vue'

const props = defineProps({
  products: Object,
})

const columns = [
  { key: 'id', label: 'ID', sortable: true },
  { key: 'name', label: 'Name', sortable: true, searchable: true },
  { key: 'price', label: 'Price', type: 'currency' },
  { key: 'active', label: 'Status', type: 'boolean' },
  { key: 'created_at', label: 'Created', type: 'date' },
  { key: 'actions', label: '', type: 'actions' },
]

const showDeleteModal = ref(false)
const selectedProduct = ref(null)

const confirmDelete = (product) => {
  selectedProduct.value = product
  showDeleteModal.value = true
}

const deleteProduct = () => {
  router.delete(`/admin/products/${selectedProduct.value.id}`)
  showDeleteModal.value = false
}
</script>

<template>
  <AdminLayout title="Products">
    <template #actions>
      <Button href="/admin/products/create" icon-left="plus">
        Add Product
      </Button>
    </template>

    <DataTable :resource="products" :columns="columns" searchable>
      <template #cell-actions="{ row }">
        <Button size="sm" href={`/admin/products/${row.id}/edit`}>
          Edit
        </Button>
        <Button size="sm" variant="danger" @click="confirmDelete(row)">
          Delete
        </Button>
      </template>
    </DataTable>

    <ConfirmModal
      v-model="showDeleteModal"
      title="Delete Product"
      message="Are you sure you want to delete this product?"
      variant="danger"
      @confirm="deleteProduct"
    />
  </AdminLayout>
</template>
```

### Create/Edit Form Page

```vue
<script setup>
import { useForm } from '@inertiajs/vue3'
import AdminLayout from '@/Components/Layout/AdminLayout.vue'
import Card from '@/Components/Containers/Card.vue'
import Form from '@/Components/Form/Form.vue'
import FormGroup from '@/Components/Form/FormGroup.vue'
import Input from '@/Components/Form/Input.vue'
import Switch from '@/Components/Form/Switch.vue'
import Button from '@/Components/UI/Button.vue'

const props = defineProps({
  product: {
    type: Object,
    default: null,
  },
})

const isEditing = !!props.product

const form = useForm({
  name: props.product?.name ?? '',
  price: props.product?.price ?? '',
  active: props.product?.active ?? true,
})

const submit = () => {
  if (isEditing) {
    form.put(`/admin/products/${props.product.id}`)
  } else {
    form.post('/admin/products')
  }
}
</script>

<template>
  <AdminLayout :title="isEditing ? 'Edit Product' : 'Create Product'">
    <Card>
      <Form @submit="submit">
        <FormGroup label="Name" :error="form.errors.name" required>
          <Input v-model="form.name" placeholder="Product name" />
        </FormGroup>

        <FormGroup label="Price" :error="form.errors.price" required>
          <Input v-model="form.price" type="number" step="0.01" min="0" />
        </FormGroup>

        <FormGroup label="Active" :error="form.errors.active">
          <Switch v-model="form.active" />
        </FormGroup>

        <div class="flex gap-4">
          <Button type="submit" :loading="form.processing">
            {{ isEditing ? 'Update' : 'Create' }}
          </Button>
          <Button variant="secondary" href="/admin/products">
            Cancel
          </Button>
        </div>
      </Form>
    </Card>
  </AdminLayout>
</template>
```

## Troubleshooting

### Common Issues

**1. Components not found**
```bash
npm run build
```

**2. Routes not registered**
```bash
php artisan route:clear
php artisan config:clear
```

**3. Migrations not running**
```bash
php artisan migrate:fresh --seed
```

**4. Permission denied**
```bash
chmod -R 775 storage bootstrap/cache
```

**5. Styles not loading**
```bash
npm run build
php artisan view:clear
```

## Support

- Documentation: https://cambo-admin.cambosoftware.com
- GitHub Issues: https://github.com/cambosoftware/cambo-admin/issues
- Email: contact@cambosoftware.com
